tag_list: joe-chierotti, chierotti, joe, joseph, joseph-chierotti, consultant, internet-consultant
overview:
Joe Chierotti grew up in Colorado where he attended school at the University of Colorado at Boulder. After graduating from CU Boulder, Joe Chierotti began his professional career in business management and internet marketing. Today Joe Chierotti is self-employed as an digital marketing and web-based technologies consultant.

Though Joe recieved a college education, the advanced knowledge of internet marketing that has allowed him to suceed and indeed thrive in the competitive profession of internet marketing and consulting stems from his real world experience in business management and development.

Outside of his professional career, Joe Chierotti enjoys staying active and fit, spending time with loved ones, traveling, seeking adventures and trying new things.
